original_text: The crowd around Jesus was growing very large, so he began to speak to them. ‘The people that are alive today are very bad,’ he said. ‘They want God to show them something powerful. But God will not do this for them. They will only see the same powerful thing that God did for Jonah.
korean_text: 무리가 모였을 때에 예수께서 말씀하시되 이 세대는 악한 세대라 표적을 구하되 요나의 표적 밖에는 보일 표적이 없나니

sentences.original_text: The crowd around Jesus was growing very large,
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님을 둘러싼 무리가 아주 커지고 있었으므로

sentences.original_text: so he began to speak to them.
'The people that are alive today are very bad,'
'They want God to show them something powerful.
sentences.korean_translation: '그들은 하나님이 그들에게 강력한 것을 보여주시기를 원한다'

sentences.original_text: But God will not do this for them.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님은 그들을 위해 그렇게 하지 않으실 것이다'

sentences.original_text: They will only see the same powerful thing
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 단지 그와 똑같은 강력한 것만 보게 될 것이다
